Content:
I have a brand new battery and all of the sudden when trying to start the bike all I get is click click click click. Sounds like a dead battery on a car. I've heard it may be a starter relay issue. Anyone that ma tell me more or thr location if the relay I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks
